Cedric Card

What’s the nickname of the murderer that Father Casey is obsessed with?

Box Solution Card (Which Suspect Killed Father Casey?)

Cryptex


Museum Nocturnus Gift Shop Bag

Puzzle

Coloring Sheet

Crayons


Message on Anna’s Card

Read this message aloud

Read the message faster and faster until the words become clear

Once Father Casey’s words are clear, you should know what to say to begin the investigation.

QR unlock: aprayer

To open the door, say a prayer and then see The Surgeon

The Hall of Murderers

In order to solve the message left in The Hall of Murderers, you should first read what Mikey has to say. Pay special attention to the words in italics.

You will need to assemble the jigsaw puzzle from the gift shop. This will tell you the order to place the murderers. Remove the name of their weapons hidden in each string of letters.

Write the remaining letters by column in the correct order and read left to right.

A restless spirit holds the key to Father Caseys death

What Holds The Key?

The answer to this question is solved by deciphering the message left in The Hall of Murderers (string of letters on each murderer card)

Take note of the underlined words in the unlock.

arestlessspirit

The Hall of Cursed Toys

Read what Lisa has to say first

She tells you that all of the toys have spoken collectively

The answer to each toy’s puzzle will give you a component to the overall solution for this portion of the case. Pay special attention to the details of the messages from each toy. Each toy provides a specific number which refers to the order in which the information should be used.

Singing Sally

Listen to what Sally has to say.

Write down what you hear

She is spelling something. Sometimes the spirits get things turned backwards when spelling from the other side

d is the first letter

Ratchet the Robot

The robot has a riddle for you.

Here is a transcript of what he is asking: Number two: I am the first in everything but the second in death. You can only see me once in a year, but I can always be found in the middle of the sea. What am I?

Answer the riddle for the second component to The Hall of Cursed Toys solution.

(number 2): the letter ‘e

Cuddle Bear

Cuddle Bear is one of the most popular exhibits at the museum.

Kids love him but don’t realize how dangerous he really is. You should have a cuddle bear coloring sheet from the gift shop.

The History of Poisons brochure contains a website that you should visit. Go to the section for Museum Nocturnus and be sure to use the crayons.

(taken from connect the dots on coloring sheet) for letter 4: four = e

Special Glasses

The QR code on this one isn’t locked, scan it

The directions mention looking through the glasses and seeing what is there...or isn’t there

Find the letter that isn’t shown.

(number 3): the letter V is the one missing from the wall

Monkey

The monkey claps his cymbals to provide messages at times.

Scan the QR code and count the number of cymbal claps in each grouping.

Each cymbal clap represents advancing one space on the alphabet (example: 1 cymbal clap =a, 2 cymbal claps =b, etc)

five is r

What is the Name Mentioned by the Toys?

The answer to this question is gained by solving all 5 puzzles provided by the cursed toys.

Each puzzle should provide a number that provides the order for each of the five letters.

Use the five letter name to unlock the file. Take note of the underlined words in the unlock

dever

The Hall of Haunted Items

It’s recommended to solve the cryptex first.

It’s also recommended to read the Death Watch and Spectral Pipe cards before doing anything else.

Cryptex

Father Casey tells you how to access the cryptex in something he said before his death

The information is found in The Hall of Haunted Items.

Scan the QR code for the Psychic Camera to get the information you need.

billy

Paranormal Printer

The printer provides a set of substitutions for all vowels

Use the key to transpose the correct letters and get the information about which of the murderers in The Hall of Murderers couldn’t possibly be responsible

the dever ancestor is not a woman (rules out The Scarlet Lady)

Spirit Pen

You are given the name of the pen’s owner.

Notice how his name is spelled at the bottom of the card. This isn’t a misprint. It’s a hint to how the puzzle works

“From the desk of Fane Uichards…” Given that the writer’s name is Cane, this misspelling tells you the number of spaces to skip along the alphabet.

Hannah’s killer isn’t found in the stars (rules out Gemini)

Clairvoyant Cipher

The key to this puzzle is in the last sentence

To be a member of the inner circle you must be willing to take one step to the right.

Rotate the inner circle one step to the right. Use what you end up with to decode the message.

the brute is dead (rules out The Brute)

Supernatural Stained Glass

The hint for this puzzle is in the quote about “no effects ever being used.”

Think of the word effects as FX.

Remove those letters from the assortment and read what’s lef

Mephisto isn’t the killer (rules out Mephisto)

What’s the Name of the Murderer…

After you’ve solved all of the haunted item puzzles, you have excluded all of those featured in The Hall of Murderers except one

This is the name you should use here.

Pay special attention to the underlined content.

mrnothing

Final Solution

You are asked for two things to solve the box: the last name of the suspect who killed Father Casey and what was used to kill him.

Part 1

1. By taking all three underlined components from the three hall unlocks, you should learn something very specific about the person who killed Father Casey.

2. Examine the actual name of the murderer from The Hall of Murderers that you couldn’t eliminate. You should find one of the suspect names that corresponds with what you learned from the underlined message.

3. Something else that will help narrow this down is to examine the time of death determined by the Death Watch and use the S.T.A.L.K. document that lists people who had access to the museum. You should be able to eliminate several suspects based on this


Part 2

1. On the S.T.A.L.K. website, the boy left two messages. One of them related to Cuddle Bear you should have already used.

2. The second message relates to the poisons listed on the History of Poisons brochure.

3. This should give you the second part of the final password

birchricin

The Lair

Content List

Lair Contents List:

Solution


#1 From Notebook

John Smith’s initial note mentions a map and lists 4 places in Valley Falls.

He then goes on to mention the point where everything converges. This is a clue about what to do.Find the place where all four locations converge.

The mention of “picking up stakes” is important because it literally means to pick your pencil up from the map and relocate it. Draw lines between points 1 and 2. Then pick up stakes and connect locations 3 and 4. The place where they meet provides a portion of the computer password.

Rich Botanical Gardens

#2 from Notebook

Locate the half sheet showing various framed pictures.

Count the number of each item listed in the notebook. You are asked for the following:

Victims with more than one eye. This means actual eyes, not eye sockets.

Single eyes and open flames. Again, eyes not eye sockets.
-Half the amount of vacant human eye sockets. There are 5 skulls with two sockets each in one photo (the broken skull should be excluded from the count) and one skull with two sockets in another photo. Take the total number of eye sockets and divide by 2.
-Total number of eyes and sockets (human or otherwise). Use last digit only. If you count the eyes and sockets of the skulls, the pumpkins, the doll heads, the victims, and count the single eyes as well you will get a two digit total. Use the second digit of that number.
You will get a 4 digit passcode that can be used to open the blue door.

2667

You are asked for the following:
-Victims with more than one eye. This means actual eyes, not eye sockets. There
are only two people shown with more than one eye.
-Single eyes and open flames. Again, eyes not eye sockets. There are three single eyes shown in the frames and three flames on the fingers of the hand. This gives you 6 for the second number.
-Half the amount of vacant human eye sockets. There are 5 skulls with two sockets each in one photo (the broken skull should be excluded from the count since it doesn’t show any eye sockets) and one skull with two sockets in another photo. This gives you a total number of 12 vacant human eye sockets. Take the total number of eye sockets and divide by 2. That gives you 6 for the third number.
-Total number of eyes and sockets (human or otherwise). Use last digit only. If you count the eyes and sockets of the skulls, the pumpkins, the doll heads, the victims, and count the single eyes as well you will get a two digit total of 47. Use the second digit of that number which is 7

Blue Door

John Smith tells you that the other half of the computer password is found in the room under the stairs.

When you open the blue door, you will see 4 words. In the notebook, John Smith tells you that all you need to do is say the words out loud.

Say each word aloud and determine what phrase he has written in an unconventional way. Note: if you’ve ever played the game Mad Gab you may understand this better. When you obtain the phrase, pull the word out that could be used to describe John Smith.

Devil in Disguise (word you will use is devil)

Computer Unlock

By completing #1 and #2 in the notebook you should have both words needed to unlock the computer (see previous if you don’t have these).

When you unlock the computer, there is a file folder in the center of the page.

Click it and watch the video that John Smith has left behind.

richdevil

#3 in Notebook

John Smith mentions a specific starting point.

Find it on the map of Valley Falls. He tells you that the intersections are all that matter

The video taken from the computer should have given you a series of directions obtained from the way the knife points in each frame. Begin at the starting intersection and go the direction that the video tells you to. You will end up on a specific road. Take note of this location. It will be used later.

cheshirerd

I See a Red Door…

The first line refers to the red door card that is in your box.

“Everything connects if you look hard enough” is a clue. You should also have a sheet with a variety of taxidermied animals.

Connect each string of numbers listed on the back of the sheet and see what letters you form. You should end up with a 4-letter word. Use the word you obtain to unlock the red door. Follow the directions on the unlock and obtain a second 4-letter word.

kill

Fetal Pig

The ending to the first portion of the box asks you to use the name of the location where John Smith felt most alive.

You should have gotten this from following the directions provided in the knife video on John Smith’s computer.

The unlock also asks for the word behind the red door. Use both components (no caps, no spaces) and unlock the end of part 1 of Lair.

cheshirerdprey
Cheshire Rd is taken from puzzle #3 in the notebook and prey is taken from the video behind the red door

Victim 1 (Heart Locket)

Examine the victim card with the heart locket.

The notebook contains a clue about this and mentions that two hearts joined together are like “mirror images of each other.”

Imagine how the letters on one side of the locket would correspond to certain letters on the opposite side of the locket if it were closed. To decode the message, take each letter on the left and find its corresponding partner on the right.

Victim 2 (Bracelet)

Examine the circular drawing in the notebook.

Find the victim who was discovered wearing a bracelet.

Each number corresponds to a specific bead on the bracelet. Decode the message.

Member Number Two Three Four Eight

Victim 3 (Back of Watch)

Find the victim with the watch.

The clue in the notebook mentions “going by the numbers.”

Rewrite each line of letters in numeric order. Read from top to bottom.

I have enjoyed our times together Sara. From Alistair.

Victim 4 (Beads)

Notice the different colored X’s on the skull.

Notice the last written page in the notebook has those same colors.

The beads on the back of the victim card correspond to the squares in on the notepad drawing. Stars denote starting places. Find the correct letters and write them in order using the colors to help.

Pw is agony

VFPD Computer

Phil Herbert assisted you before on the Easthaven Forest case and is willing to do so again if you can solve the riddle he poses.

Answer the riddle and unlock the computer.

The information found on the computer will help identify Victim 5.

fire

Victim 5/What is This Victim ’ s Last Name?

Once you’ve unlocked the VFPD computer you should gain access to a report of the most recent missing persons.

Find the name and identity that seems to match the picture of the victim.

Use her last name to unlock.

westerhouse

Cerberus Club Card

To complete this step you will need two pieces of information. The first piece you gained from solving the puzzle with the different lettered beads.
2. Enter the password as directed and meet Ellsworth.

Ellsworth is the gatekeeper at The Cerberus Club, and he isn’t going to let you pass until you have provided a full set of initials and a member id number.
2. The killer has provided all of this information in clues he left with the other four victims.
3. You will need 3 letters and 4 numbers to get past Ellsworth and into the club.

Password to gain access (part 1): agony
Password to get past Ellsworth (part 2): aex2348

Medical Drawing #1

Notice that all 3 of the medical drawings you have are numbered.

The first one requires additional information on the blood-stained letter from the killer. Examine his last paragraph.

Locate each of the places on the skeleton mentioned in the letter and obtain the corresponding letter from the skeletal chart. You should end up with a 6 letter word.

letter

Medical Drawing #2

The killer has written two notes at the top that say ‘It’s as easy as A-B-C” and “the body thrives when everything is in order.”

Both of these are clues.

Find out which letter of the alphabet each number corresponds to (A=1, B=2, etc). Arrange the letters in the correct order to make a 5-letter word.

after

Medical Drawing #3

Several letters are circled.

You are told to add up the letters and see what you get. This uses the reverse method from Medical Drawing #2.

Determine which number (1-26) each letter is represented by (1=A, 2=B, etc, add the numbers up, then determine which letter of the alphabet you end up with.

20 which corresponds to the letter t

Butterfly Bookmark

In his letter, the killer has tasked you with determining who his next victim will be

To do so, you will need the answers to all three of the medical drawing puzzles.

Put the answers you’ve gotten in order and you will be directed to a specific letter of the alphabet.Alistair’s letter has an underlined portion that says “When you’ve learned the identity of the next victim be sure to spell it out.” The identity of the next victim is a three-letter word.

you

The 3 medical puzzles say: letter after T (which is u). Alistair tells you to spell out what you find. So u spelled out would be ‘you.

Chessboard

In the last bag you open, you should have a basement image with a series of numbers at the bottom.

2. The rules for how to use those numbers with the chessboard are the last two sentences on the page.

Determine the right letter that goes with each number (using the chessboard) and you should end up with an 8-letter word.

headache

Telephone

The note by the phone says, “Use what ails you to dial for help.”

The 8-letter word you got from the chessboard is an ailment.

Translate each letter to a number using the phone’s keypad. This series of numbers will unlock the QR code.

85141385

Final Solution

The solution card asks you to provide the killer’s real name.

When you unlock the phone QR you should notice a label on the bottle.

Consult the list from The Cerberus Club for the favorite drink of every member and find the member who favors that particular drink. Use the name to solve the box.

davidyork

Zachary Allen, VFPD Forensics

Read the Valley Falls PD Detective Notes.

Pay attention to the information at the bottom of the page.

milkshake

adsw

Red Skull Painting

Unlock “Property of Justin Harris” card first.

fivestarforensics

Blueprint card

Read the interview with each suspect for clues on where other suspects were sitting.

Make sure that your orientation is correct. Example. If it mentions that someone is seated directly to the left of someone else, imagine that you are seated at a table and someone is seated directly to your left.

Find where Jodie was seated. Everyone else can be seated off of her placement.

tajdarjx

The Path of Madness

Read the information on the sheet with the tree.

Pay attention to who was murdered.

Pay attention to the ages of the children who died from cholera. Add their ages together.

abigail10

By Appointment Only

Notice the symbols from this card match with symbols on the Fratesi’s Oddities & Curiosities document.

Using the math equations, figure out the value for each symbol.

Start with the equation of 3 birds added together. Once you have the values for each symbol, use the order from the “By Appointment Only” card.

2619014312

Sycamore Lane

Unlock “By Appointment Only” card first.

Part 1 – Solve the colored dots and pins puzzle.

Dante Fratesi tells you a second piece to help solve the colored dots and pins puzzle. He tells you to use the word in white. Identify the white dots on one image and see what letters correspond to those locations on the similar image. See what word that you can form with these letters. Part 2 – Given to you by Dante Fratesi

sorceryfratty

Sheet with symbols/letters/red skull in background

This is accessible only once you have been instructed to open the feather bag.

There are multiple symbols on this sheet that appear on another item that you get from the feather bag. You should see this symbol or a version of it on the red/black/white voodoo priest card.Notice where the red skulls are in relation to this symbol.

One of the red skulls should be in the middle of two of these symbols. But the second symbol is flipped in the opposite direction. Look on the sheet with the red skull in the background. Take the letters that appear in between each group to form a statement.

SETTHEDRUMMERFREE – SET THE DRUMMER FREE (eliminates the suspect who plays the drums)

Voodoo Mary “Into the Night” cd insert

This is accessible only once you have been instructed to open the feather bag.

Jean-Pierre mentioned going to a Voodoo Mary show and getting Mary’s autograph. Notice that Mary’s autograph is on the inside of the cd insert. Jean-Pierre has a vision that mentions numbers.

Notice that the song list is numbered and the first letter of each song is in bold. Use the numbers from the vision of Jean-Pierre and the bold letter that corresponds to those numbers to form a statement.

NEWGIRLISPURE – NEW GIRL IS PURE

Candle puzzle

This is accessible only once you have been instructed to open the feather bag. Unlock The Path of Madness

You are provided with candle locations. Notice that the diagram matches up to the modern day seating blueprint. Read the personal account of Terry Hebert and pay attention to the underlined statement. This statement is telling you that the candles are in their FINAL location AFTER a ritual had been performed.

Listen to the arrowhead audio from Jean-Pierre. This audio gives you the instructions of the ritual START TO FINISH. Jean-Pierre had more to say, “determine who corresponds to the location of the orange candle before the ritual instructions were performed and be assured that they are innocent.” So, you need to figure out who had the orange candle BEFORE the ritual was performed. You know the FINAL location of each candle AFTER the ritual was performed (The Path of Madness diagram). And you know the ritual instructions START TO FINISH from the arrowhead audio. Take the candle diagram from The Path of Madness and work the ritual instructions backwards. You work them backwards because you are needing to do everything in reverse to get them back to where they were at the beginning. So, start with the last ritual instruction and work your way towards the first one. Also, make note that if an instruction was counter-clockwise that in order to go in reverse you will need to go clockwise. Once you have done this, compare the candle locations with the modern day blueprint seating and see which suspect corresponds to the orange candle.

Orange candle corresponds to Tamika

To bring back the life, you must give the life.
Two spots counter-clockwise all colors must go
Then one for the other, only swap black and yellow
With just one color straight across, the red must be changed
From orange, two spots counter-clockwise swap only that color with orange
One spot counter-clockwise all colors must go
To bring back the life, you must give the life.
Give the life of the one holding onto the black.

Sheet with 16 jars

This is accessible only once you have been instructed to open the feather bag.

Unlock Zachary Allen first.

Once you have forensics analysis of the contents of the gris-gris bag, use the letters that correspond to each ingredient to form a word.

cloak

Jodie Wong Residence

Access feather bag once instructed to do so.

Solve the sheet with 16 jars. (Part 2 of password)

Scan the Dr. Laveau card. Once you know the ingredients that were found, listen to the video to tell you the type of spell. (Part 1 of password)

protectioncloak

Bank card

Can only be solved after you have opened and completed the feather bag.

Unlock the Jodie Wong Residence card. Read the note that was found on the refrigerator with the smiley face magnet.

It mentions “a hat with a big red bow”. The note on the back says “I hope it clicks for me”. Click on the screen on the hat with the red bow. *Make sure that you did not take a screenshot of this image and that you are trying to click on the screenshot. This will give you the Key # (Part 1 of Password. Part 2 of Password deal with suspect eliminations. You should have eliminated 6 suspects at this point.
a. Red Skull painting/Luminol Unlock – Pay attention to who the artist of the painting was. Eliminates 1
b. Blueprint unlock - Eliminates 2
c. Symbols/Letters sheet with Red skull image in background – Eliminates 1
d. Voodoo Mary cd insert – Eliminates 1
e. Candle ritual/Orange candle – Eliminates 1
f. See Suspect Eliminations file for more details on suspect eliminations

508aadrtx
a. Red Skull painting/Luminol Unlock – Eliminates Donna Dutkofski
b. Blueprint unlock - Eliminates Aaron Phillips and Xyler Christy
c. Symbols/Letters sheet with Red skull image in background – Eliminates Arielle Branco
d. Voodoo Mary cd insert – Eliminates Rachelle Currie
e. Candle ritual/Orange candle – Eliminates Tamika Reese

Final Solution

This can only be unlocked after you have solved all puzzles and opened all bags.

You have eliminated 6 suspects already and the killer is the 7th suspect. Read through one document to determine motive. Read through the second document to identify the nickname of the killer.

skye

Evidence Room Door

The interview with office Garton will have the information you need to get into the evidence room. Complete the sudoku puzzle the office left for you to do.

Use the order of left to right, top to bottom like you would read a line of text.

What you find will implicate at least one person.

874129881

Security Login

Paul Woodward’s interview is a good place to start. Paul left a sticky note by the computer with clues for the password. Search through the materials you have to find the 3 parts of the password.

The museum brochure is a good place to look. What is the name of Patricia's pet? Maybe she has a picture of it.

This will implicate at least one person.

trex8moxie

QR code on Charles White Interview

Look at the wire diagram, it has the model number you need.

3200

Fixed the Camera System?

Follow the directions from the audio you get from Charles White.

Green connects to 4. So the 4 is the first number since green is the first color from left to right.

This will implicate a person.

4621735

Albert’ s Office

Just scan, it is not locked. There is a card with Xs on it that gives a hint on where to search.

One part of the room is clickable. Once you find it you will be prompted for a password.

You won't be able to open it until you have opened the envelope.

Click on the picture behind Albert’s desk.

Note on the back of the WW2 poster

Does anything else you have go with WW2? Try looking through the museum brochure. Take a close look at the code machine photo.

The dots on the back of the WW2 poster match the dots with letters on the code machine. The arrows show how the letters are swapped. So A=W and vice versa.

The message should start with “Tyrene…” This will implicate at least one person.

Tyrene meet me at the side door tonight I can't wait to see you Daniel F

Noah Parker ’ s Locker

You will need to have unlocked the security login to proceed.

Noah gave a hint to the locker combination in his interview. Look again at the security login file.

Note that one of the codes used is not like the others.

85238791

Card found in Noah Parker ’ s Locker

The phrase “it will be magical” is a hint. What else do you have that relates to magic?

Use the “Magic Throughout History” poster with the number number message you have on the card. The numbers indicate what letter you should pull from the message on the poster.

So 1 would be C, 2 would be O, 3 would be M, etc. The message should start with “Hey…”

“Hey Slim, break into McCains office find details of artifact shipment.”

Crime Scene Findings

Pay close attention to the height and weight mentioned.

Use the employee records to find out who climbed in through the window.

This will implicate a person.

Craig Zinkiewicz is the only person that meets the description.

Part 2 Envelope Unlock

Some people may be implicated more than once. What you find on the phone from the evidence room will implicate at least one person. What you find from the security login will implicate at least one person.

What you find from the security camera will implicate one person. What you find from the coded message on the back of the WW2 poster will implicate at least one person.

What you find from examining the crime scene will implicate one person. Noah’s nickname is on the card you find in his locker. You will need to translate the number message to get it.

bikmoptslim

IMAX Computer and Cash Register

Read through the suspect testimonies carefully. Berry mentions an animal he uses as his password.

Look at the candy wrapper you found at the beginning and use that animal as the password.

You should be able to eliminate two suspects.

cow

Tyrene ’ s Office

Just scan, it is not locked.

Search the office carefully.

Click on the books that are on the desk. You should find a message written on a post-it note.

Tyrene ’ s Office Cabinet

You need to search Tyrene’s office first. Where else have you seen the 4 things written on the post-it note you found in Tyrene’s office?

Take a look at the 4 paintings. Count the things in the paintings. And use the order of the post-it note.

You should be able to eliminate two suspects.

5132

Crossword and Horoscope

Follow the direction from the horoscope and pair it with the crossword.

The words in the crossword puzzle are the roads and streets the horoscope is referencing. When you stop to pick up something you are picking up a letter.

You should get 5 letters all together. The first letter you get is U.

union

Susan’s Filing Cabinet

If you use the word you get from the crossword and horoscope puzzle, what would you type into the keypad? Use the numbers not the letters.

So the first number is 8 since U is on the 8 button.

You should be able to eliminate a suspect.

86466

Email Login

The password hint has what you need. Look over the list of tools that is on the cork board.

Notice that there are letters for each tool. So Mallet would get you D.

You should be able to eliminate a suspect.

dumbboss

Picture in Albert’ s Office

You found a card at the beginning that starts with “My mind’s not what it…” Do you have anything else that matches the grid pattern of the Xs?

Use the Cataloguing Cabinet with the card. Follow the 4 sets of directions on the card.

You will get 5 letters. The first letter is B

bleed

Who is the Killer

You will need to have eliminated all suspects, but one. You will also need to get into the safe found in Alberts office.

Click on the photo behind Alberts desk to open. (make sure you are clicking on the webpage image and not a screen shot.) You will need to use the word you get from the card with the Xs and the Cataloguing Cabinet to unlock the safe. (see page above.)

Use the tag you found at the beginning to determine what weapon was used.

riggsmuramasa

Catch Me If You Can

Content List

Catch Me If You Can Contents List:

Half Sheets:

Beginning Brief

Polaroid/Collector letter

Maze

I’m Puzzled

Painting on Easel

4x6 Cards:

Lottery Ticket

Smartphone

The Eye in the Sky Sees All

Metal Gate with Call Box 345

Fingerprints

Circus

Tattoo Parlor

Arcade

Bar

Library

Jigsaw Woman

Box Solution


Miscellaneous:

Valley Falls Needs You Business Card

Memory Card

5 Valley Falls University Student IDs (Michele Drake, Ali Spencer, Paisley Hall, Paulina Shaw, Rhonda Baker)

Prometheus Artwork/Greek Image of Man Getting Attacked by an Eagle

Collectible Card

Bag Contents: Balloon, Bottle Opener, Sticker, Arcade Token, Microcassette


Using the Items in the Pouch:

The items in the pouch will be used to unlock the circus, the bar, the tattoo parlor, and the arcade.

Unlocking the Circus

Blow up the balloon so you can read the words on both sides.

“Under the big top you’ll find one…”

Count what you have on both sides and make an easy association to come up with a word that would make sense in The Collector’s twisted game. Use it to unlock the circus. Take note of the symbol that you find and its meaning.

foot

Unlocking the Bar

Examine the bottle opener in the pouch.

Use the arrows to determine which way to move along the alphabet. Shift each letter in the correct direction.

Use the word you obtain to unlock the bar. Take note of the symbol you find there and what it means.

finger

Unlocking the Arcade

Pay special attention to the name of the arcade and the slogan.

Also take note of the words with stars above them. Examine the arcade token and note that stars and an eagle’s head are both featured on one side.

The slogan refers, in part, to the direction the eagle’s head is facing. Move in that direction from each of the stars and use the word you obtain to unlock the arcade. Take note of the symbol you find and what it means.

eye

Unlocking the Tattoo Parlor

Examine the sticker you have in your pouch.

Notice the graffiti message on the side of the tattoo parlor wall. Do what the graffiti message says literally with regard to the letters on the sticker

Take the remaining letters and use them to form a word that would be significant to The Collector. Use this to unlock the tattoo parlor. Take note of the symbol you find there and its value.

tongue

Cell Phone

The beginning brief gives you two places to start: the business card or the pouch of items.

If you start with the business card, it mentions giving The Collector a call and says maybe you’ll Get Lucky (there is a card with this at the top). Notice that the grid on the lottery ticket and the grid of apps on the phone correspond.

Use the numbers from the lottery ticket to give you the correct order for the apps. *Note: Pay special attention to the last sentence on the business card. It is important. **Note 2: Also pay special attention to the person who owns this phone (phone background). This information will be needed to move forward.

Message 1: Start at library (taken from the app letters)
Message 2: Go to the start point. Enter student id number and last name to access.

Library Unlock

The messages you get from the cell phone provide specific information on how to gain access to the library

The map of Valley Falls University and the ID card belonging to the owner of the phone will be needed for this.

Make sure to keep up with every location on the map you find.

2563766drake

Bulfinch’ s Mythology

When you unlock the library, you obtain this book and find a message taped to the back.

The Collector instructs you to “use the name of the building you end up with to talk to my puzzled lady friend.” You should have a sheet in your box that features a series of puzzle pieces that says “I’m puzzled.”

Count the number of each puzzle piece shape on the ‘I’m puzzled’ sheet and use that to complete the equation on the taped note. The number you end up with provides the location to location number two on the map and also provides the answer to unlock the card featuring a woman’s face made entirely of puzzle pieces. Note: To get the correct answer, you may have to rotate or flip some of the pieces for an accurate count.

shelleyhall (location 10)

Maze

You should have a maze with a skull at the top.

Work this as you would a normal maze and obtain a fact that will be useful. Once you’ve unlocked the puzzle piece woman, you will obtain a notepad with the same skull at the top as the one on the maze.

This puzzle will give you two different message (one from completing the maze and one by substituting the words from the notepad with the words in the maze that lie on the correct path). Substitute the words from the notepad with the words on the correct path of the maze. This will give you location number three and tell you how to unlock the self portrait. Make sure to take note of these.

Message 1: What a coincidence that one victim and location three both share the same name.
Message 2: Use identification number to unlock my self portrait and learn about location number four.
Location 3: Paisley Hall

Self-Portrait (strange painting on easel)

Use the information gained from the maze puzzle along with the information from the correct ID badge to unlock this.

(taken from Paisley Hall’s id and gained by information learned from completing the maze puzzles): 3157382

SD Card

When you unlock the self-portrait (see previous step) you will obtain a card for the Valley Falls Computer Science Program.

One side of the SD card corresponds to the left side of the Computer Science Program Card. The other side of the SD card applies to the right side of the Computer Science Program Card.

Left Side-find that letter on the Computer Science Program Card that matches up to the numbers (in order going from 1-20). Example: 1=H, 2=A, etc). Do this for all of the numbers and obtain a message about location 4. Right Side-use the flip side of the SD card to determine the order of colors. The first color mentioned is red. Find all of the red letters and use them to form a word. (First word = Ali’s). Repeat this for the additional colors, going in the order they are mentioned. You will find out something useful that will be used with the Movie poster.

1. Left Side Answer-Harris Hall is Stop Four
2. Right Side Answer-Ali’s Major Opens The Cinema

Horrors/Cinema Unlock

One of the messages gained from the SD card puzzles will provide the information needed to unlock this.

You will also need information off of one of the ID cards. Once you’ve unlocked the file, you will see a message that is difficult to read.

There is a hint in the upper left hand corner of the Horrors/Cinema poster that will help with reading this. If squinting doesn’t help reading this, try tilting your device and reading this from the side.

accounting (gained by solving one of the SD card puzzles and using Ali’s major from her ID card to unlock)
The unlock to this gives you: location 5 Carlton Building

Death in A Suit/Eye in the Sky

Once you find all 5 locations, you need to determine what to do with them. The directions on the back of this card should help.

Each step is numbered and written in a different font

Read each step in the correct order and use the location numbers you’ve found to determine how to gain access to the eye in the sky. Use what you learn to unlock the card that says “The Eye in the Sky Sees All!”

1. Take the numbers of the five locations and add them together.
2. You will end up with a two digit number.
3. Add those two digits together rto find the location that will give you information about who I am.
4. Use the name of the building to gain access to the eye in the sky.

The number of each location is as follows: library (5), Shelley Hall (10), Paisley Hall (7), Harris Hall (32), and Carlton Building (18)

Add all the location numbers together and you should end up with 72. Add those two digits together and you obtain the number 9. Location 9 on the map is security.

Login for Valley Falls University

When you unlock the Eye in the Sky card, the security guard not only tells you The Collector’s real name but also says that he left some information for you on one of the security systems. It involves using the year Rhonda was born and the hidden message on her picture.

You will need the Polaroid photo for this and Rhonda’s ID card. You should notice that in the Polaroid The Collector has left some of his symbols on the chair that Rhonda is sitting in.

Note: These symbols don’t correspond with the same letters that The Collector used in part 1. Locating the four victims will be required to learn the value for each symbol (see unlocking the circus, the bar, the arcade, and the tattoo parlor). The security guard also mentions things running like clockwork. That’s a hint on how to read what you unlock.

luvlri2000

Unlocking the Gate/345

When you gain access to the Valley Falls University security system, you discover that The Collector has patched you in to the locations where all four victims have been found.

He has left you a message that is read by going in a clockwise direction.

The message provides the password to unlock the 345 location.

patchwork

Handprints

When you unlock the 345 Eagle Street address, you obtain a fingerprint and a set of handprints.

Determine which fingerprint on the card matches the one on the unlock. Take note of the number of the fingerprint. The handprints on the unlock provide the way to decode the numbers associated with that fingerprint.

Determine which fingers the fingerprint value matches up with on the card and translate that number using what you’ve unlocked. The Collector also tells you to use Paulina’s special number. Use the translated number you find along with the number found hidden on Paulina’s ID card. Take note of the information found on The Collector’s word badge.

36325

Prometheus/Man Getting Attacked by Eagle

Once you unlock the handprint card and rescue Rhonda, she gives you a clue about how to decode the card featuring Prometheus.

Her clue involves moving backwards and forwards along the alphabet.

Once you have the answer to this, you will have part of the answer to the final solution.

up on roof

Final Solution

The components for the final solution will be found on the Prometheus puzzle solution and the Handprints unlock.

Take note of the blanks on the final solution card. This tells you how many characters you will use.

roof040783

torihawkins39

Motel “Who are you looking for here?” card

Scan the “Anonymous Tip Line” card (no password required).

april

Den of Thieves

When you look in the chat transcript you see that (TheKoolAidMan) says “Umm password??” The response by the original poster is “What music is IN cognito?” This is telling you that you are looking for something hidden inside of the word cognito. Find the word cognito on the page.

Look at the screen name of the person that started the chat.

The letters in italics spell the word cognito. So, look at the letters in between or “IN cognito” and that will be the password to unlock the Feel the Music code.

techno

Thornmire County Evidence note

Read the note carefully. You are provided instructions within the note on what to do with the note. The instruction you are given is “take the words here made with 4 and appear only one time”.

Look through the entire note and pull out the words made with 4 letters that appear only one time in the note. You should find 4 words that have 4 letters that appear only one time.

The last line reads “Can you feel it?” and this information is with the victim Amanda Limoges. Notice that on the Den of Thieves sheet that the post reads “Can you feel it??” c/o Amanda L. These items connect.

wish, take, made, only

After Unlocking Den of Thieves

Make sure you solve the Thornmire County Evidence note. Once you have unlocked the Den of Thieves, the first image you see gives you instructions on what to do with the information that you gained from the Thornmire County Evidence note.

Take the words that you found in the note, in the order that you found them, and spell them. With the graphic you get for each letter in the video, combine all 4 graphics (4 letters) for each word and see what you create.

Since you have 4 words, you will end up with 4 new creations. The result will be 4 numbers. *Note – these numbers might not be used immediately.

9860

Case File Number 00126 Phone of Darlene Losier

Read the interview with Kimberly Lancaster. You are told about a piece of jewelry.

2. Spell the word from the jewelry on the phone keypad to unlock the phone.

Make sure you use the numbers that connect to the correct letters to unlock the phone.

5683

Mom Text Messages

Take notice of the text message that mentions tracking a package. This is a website that can be accessed. Visit the website and take note of what is needed there. This will be used at a later time. Back to the Mom Text Messages. There are 4 texts that come through with what looks like random letters. There is a piece of Evidence found with this case that can help you decode those texts.

Exhibit B. Notice there are letters in each statement that are underlined. In each statement, these are the letters that are to be swapped. For example, U is D means U=D, I is O means I=O, etc. The final line reads “Part of the key is here. Figure out the rest.” Notice the pattern that you have been given with the underlined letters and use that pattern to figure out the remaining substitutions.

Once you have decoded the messages, you will be given instructions for the office photo. You will end up with 4 numbers. *Note – these numbers might not be used immediately.

Text 1- Count what is red and that is the first
Text 2- For the second you need all of the tools for marking
Text 3- Third is obtained with eyewear plus food
Text 4- Finally the fourth you get when you count all the notes
Solution 4735

Office Photo

Reference “Mom Text Messages” here.

Case File Number 00127

Unlock the “Will Street Detective Agency Login card” first. This was not in the envelope but was initially out in the box. Use the information from Exhibit D on the Evidence sheet with the information that Benjamin gives you on his yellow legal paper note about the CD.

Notice that the center of the CD fits around the black circles on Exhibit B-1. Also, notice that on the back of Exhibit B-1 is a compass. The audio file from the “Will Street Detective Agency Login card” gives you directions for the CD and for Exhibit B-1.

The first audio clue says “From I look W.” Place the center of the CD over the I. You are told to look W (W=west). The first letter that is to the west is the letter “O”. Continue this process until you have found a letter for each audio clue. You will end up with 4 numbers. *Note – these numbers might not be used immediately.

1265

Coyote Parcel Service website

You are asked for a 12-digit tracking number

From each case, you should have solved for a 4-digit number.

Put the numbers in chronological order. *Note – the 3rd case that is connected was actually the first case chronologically.

986047351265

Abandoned house “Trip location…” card.

Part 1 -Unlock Motel “Who are you looking for here?” card

Part 2 – Once you have figured out the 12 digit Coyote Parcel Service tracking number, look at the final house number.

paris381

How to eliminate each suspect

Anonymous Tip Line – Audio message eliminates Devon Blitzer.

Motel Unlock – John Eibach was at the motel with April.

Abandoned House Unlock – Jeremy Steele is found dead. Milton Drake is eliminated by the cigarette having lipstick on it and the fact that he doesn’t smoke Newport. Dana Bodo is eliminated by the fact that she doesn’t smoke Newpor.

Final Solution

Part 1 - Read the newspaper article from the Abandoned house card unlock.

Part 2 – You should have eliminated all but 1 suspect at this point. Reference Suspect Eliminations here if needed.

fancyjacki

Matching Up Suspects With Their Homes

Marjorie Garcia drew a diagram of the homes in the area of Fairmont Estates (Where Each Suspect Lives)

Use her descriptions of each suspect (Marj’s Thoughts From Behind The Wall) to connect each symbol on the home diagram to each suspect.

Percentage - Sandra St. Laurent
Question Mark - Lloyd Faulkner
Tree - Matt Parrish
: ) - Mark Gavit
Hat - Cynthia Jahs
Fire - Charles Payne
Red F - Donna McNeil
Asterisk - Jonny Lee

Accessing The Root Cellar

In her “Help!” letter the second thing Marjorie instructs you to do is access the root cellar. She provides a set of instructions that should be useful.

She tells you to “match” things up which points toward the match puzzle. She also tells you that Jack might be able to help (he has additional instructions on how to work this particular puzzle).

Use the instructions that Marjorie and Jack provide to determine a numerical combination for the lock that will allow you to access the root cellar. Remember that opposing directions cancel each other out so you can eliminate those from consideration.

223142

Burger Card

To play and see if you are an instant winner enter the last 4 digits of the transaction number from the receipt to unlock the file.

In a note that she left, Marjorie says, “I recommend a burger and a good book when taking the red eye.” Use the red lens from the 3D glasses to view the hidden numbers in the burger unlock. **Note: Do not wear the glasses. Hold the red lens over the image like a magnifying glass.

These numbers provide the correct order for the list of books she provided on the “More Thoughts From Behind the Wall by Marj” sheet. List the books in the correct order. Read the first letter of each book title. ***Note: If you are unable to see the numbers for any reason, you can watch a video of how this works here:
https://deadboltmysterysociety.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/redlens.mov

8138 (to unlock Burger Card)
Numbers Found In Hidden Message Contained In Burger Card Unlock: 2, 10, 1, 4, 6, 5, 11, 7, 3, 9, 8

Accessing The Little Library

The little library has a placard hanging underneath that says “What is here?”

The question is one that you answer from the previous puzzle involving the burger instant win card, the burger receipt, the 3d glasses, and the list of book titles.

Take the answer from the previous puzzle solution and use to unlock. This is a two word answer (no caps, no spaces).

acult

Star Door

Jack mentions a door with a chain fastened in a star pattern with a strange lock at the end of the tunnel beneath the wishing well.

You have another strange diagram with a riddle at the bottom that begins with “Make a wish…”The word ‘wish’ is the key to link these two. The riddle tells you that you are looking for a name (“name the one”)

It also says “Use most once, use one twice.”Notice that two of the Roman numerals are circle once but one is circled twice. Match up the Roman numerals that are circled with the number that corresponds to them on the lock that is pictured on the back of the Star Door card. Use the letter that matches up with that particular number. Remember that one of those numbers is used twice which means the letter is used twice as well. You should end up with a 4 letter name

baal

Maze

When you unlock the Star Door there is a strange circular diagram on the floor with bull symbols scattered throughout.

You also have a maze that reads Family First at the top. Find the letters in the maze that correspond to the bull symbols.

The bold lines from the Star Door unlock match up to the breaks in the maze. You should obtain a word. Use the word that you obtain to unlock the flash drive with the maze symbol on it

Flash Drive

Notice the maze symbol on the flash drive.

The password gained by solving the maze/sigil from behind the Star Door puzzle is the unlock for this.

worship

Newspaper Clipping From Flash Drive

When you unlock the flash drive you will be given a newspaper clipping with several words that have letters underlined in red.

You should have a card in your box with an audio recording that is labeled ‘Play Me.’ In her recording, Marjorie Garcia mentions all of the words or phrases from the newspaper clipping.

Use the order that she mentions each of them to provide the correct order for the underlined letters. You should end up with a word from this. She also mentions at the end of her recording that “where there’s smoke, there’s fire.” This means to use the word that you obtain to unlock the fireplace.

Accessing the Fireplace

Use the word that you obtain from the previous puzzle with the newspaper clipping and voice recording to unlock this.

Take note of those houses that are marked with a red x and note which suspects those correspond to.

Marjorie has denoted that these are members of the cult.

induction

Accessing the Shed

When accessing the little library, you should have gotten a moon chart that featured values for each moon phase.

You should also have a strange sheet with these same moon symbols. Notice that the shed is locked with a rotary dial lock. Jack provides some insight on how these locks work and even tells you the order.

Use the numbers that correspond to the moon phases marked L, R, and L. Enter them in the correct order to access the shed. Take note of those houses that are marked with a red x and note which suspects those correspond to. Marjorie has denoted that these are members of the cult.

31913

Unlocking the Box Beneath the Oak Tree

In the unlock to the root cellar, Marjorie leaves a strange message behind that begins, “Oh, and there’s one more thing,”

You should have a document in your box with various images that match up to the things that Marjorie mentions (key, all-seeing eye, etc). You also have a sheet of numbers that, when placed, over the sheet of images should correspond perfectly to the images. Identify each image from Marjorie’s message and find the corresponding number in the order that she mentions them.

Use this to unlock the box beneath the tree. Take note of those houses that are marked with a red x and note which suspects those correspond to.

76193

Welcome to Fairmont Estates

Jack mentions helping Marjorie Garcia break into the property manager’s office and provides details on how to access that.

By now, you should have unlocked the box beneath the oak tree, the shed, and the fireplace. Each of those unlocks feature two numbers in the upper right corner.

Consult Jack’s notes to see which one to use (upper or lower). Use the numbers in order to unlock the office. This should be a six-digit number.

342911

Grid Map

When you unlock the property manager’s office you are given a grid with a note from Marjorie.

She instructs you to determine the plots that no one owns. Consult the Fairmont Estates Lot Ownership document.

Determine which plots on the map aren’t owned and list them in order. It may be helpful to draw off a recreation of the grid map and mark the plots that are owned. There will be four plots left that have no owner. These are the plots where the four missing girls are buried. Use the plots in alphabetical order to unlock the “Where are the Missing Girls?” card.

Where Are The Missing Girls?

The answer to this puzzle comes from the information you’ve gained from the grid map/lot ownership puzzle.

You are looking for four plot coordinates in alphabetical order.

b3d5f2i6

Final Solution

After unlocking the “Where are the missing girls?” card you should have noticed a specific word in all caps. This is the word used to describe the killer.

You also have been told that the killer isn’t a member of the cult you’ve been tracking.

At this point, you should have determined all of the members of the cult and are left with one who is not. Use the first name of the killer and the word from the unlock to solve the box.

mattunbeliever

Let’s Move to Los Angeles postcard (addressed to Harrison McAfee)

Notice in the last sentence on the postcard that the word AFTER is in all caps. Also, notice the word that follows.

The word that follows is baby. View this as “AFTER baby.” Notice that “baby” was used throughout the message on the postcard.

Pull out the word that comes after baby every time throughout the message.

Username great password escape

Hand with strings

Read the interview with Allen Potts.

He tells you “Did you know that the thumb is special because it can help you grasp things? If you try hard enough you can grasp things with the other fingers, but it can be tough. That's why the thumb comes first as far as I'm concerned.” Take the column of letters that relate to the thumb as the first column and then from there go in the natural order of the fingers for the remaining columns.(Thumb, index finger, middle finger, ring finger, pinky)

It might be helpful to re-write the columns of letters in the correct order. Then read through each row of letters in order to find the message. The message starts with “The guards…”

“The guards trust you Alfie you wont be checked get chlorine from your work station do this and you’re in”

Riverbend Penitentiary Inmate Electronic Mail Login

See hints for Let’s Move Los Angeles postcard (addressed to Harrison McAfee)

greatescape

Commissary Shopping List

First unlock the Riverbend Penitentiary Inmate Electronic Mail Login

Part of the email reads “Buy item from commissary that costs as much as a 20 minute phone call and give to your cellmate.” Read the interview with Allen Potts

He tells you “Feel free to call me if you have any more questions. If you were an inmate that would cost you seventeen cents per minute.” Now that you know how long the phone call lasts and how much a phone call costs per minute, calculate the cost of a 20 minute phone call. Compare this price to the list of items on the Commissary Shopping List.

mouthwash

Scott French Library Worker card

First unlock the Riverbend Penitentiary Inmate Electronic Mail login

Part of the email reads “Use 1 and 2 here together to gain access to the library worker. (No caps, No spaces)”

Use what you calculate from #1 in the e-mail with what is given to you in #2 of the e-mail.

mouthwashfoodchain

Note found in Cigarette pack

First unlock the Riverbend Penitentiary Inmate Electronic Mail login

Read #4 on the e-mail: “we were once on top, but now we have dropped to the bottom in this garbage dump.” This is telling you to go from the top of the columns to the bottom

You are then told “in each grouping take all numbers after the first 9. Then the alphabet should be of assistance". Pull all of the numbers after the first 9 in a group. Ex. 919 = 19, 299 = 9. Then, convert the numbers to their place in the alphabet, 1=A, 2=B…9=I…19=S

“Spill milk punch jose start riot”

Sinks and mirrors(What gets spilled…)

(Part 1) Solve the Note found in Cigarette Pack

Read Willie Morrow’s interview about what was being said in sleep. Unlock Scott French Library Worker card

Use what you get from Willie Morrow’s interview with directions that you get from when you unlock Scott French Library Worker card to give you (Part 2)

milk100

Cell Block F envelope

(Part 1) Read the interview with Lisa Hanigan and pay attention to the message signed by The Puppet Master.

As you solve puzzles you will see phrases like “you’re in” or “you are in.” These are the names you will need. (Part 2) Unlock the Scott French Library Worker card. You are told that you have been provided with the “go time”

Read Russell Stobaugh’s interview and notice what he says about Johnny’s song. Uses the lyrics from Johnny’s song to give you the order of the animals. Use the numbers from those animals in the order of the lyrics from Johnny’s song to give you the “go time”.

ahjmw1025

Yellow postcard(addressed to Lukas Stark)

Pay attention to what it says about having two eyes and being able to look at two different things at the same time. “Left eye one letter, Right eye next letter”

Start with the first letter ( L ) and pull out every other letter and see what message that you get

Repeat the process and start with the second letter ( R )and pull out every other letter and see what message that you get. The first message should start with “Lukas get map…”.

“Lukas get map from co and visitor log from lawyer give bother to sonny” “River Bend Blues would be a nice song given our circumstances haha”

United States Map

Solve the yellow postcard (addressed to Lukas Stark) to see what goes with this.

Once you know what goes with the map, go through the list of states and find the state on the map and pull out the word that goes with that state.

After you have pulled out all the letters, read the message that you get.

“When working your laundry shift get a second pair of socks soak one sock in first chemical and the other soak in bleach then put those on your feet over socks give to Scott when he comes by on book duty”

Writing on Wall (white writing on blue wall)

Each question mark represents one word.

Solve each line to get a total of 3 words.

Writing the words out might help.

Duel

Scorecard

Calculating the total points to determine the winner of the duel is one of the main objectives of the box

The scorecard should be used to keep a running total of points and updated with each new victim found.

Victims #1 and #2

The duel begins with the murders of Daniel Jernigan and Carrie Mendelay.

Consult the Duel Rules that Anubis has provided and calculate the point values earned for each victim. Read the Serpent card and the Red Bishop card to learn how each one kills their victims.

Assign the points to the correct killer and record the points on the Scorecard (you will use this throughout the entire box)

Victim #1 (Daniel Jernigan) is worth 50,000 points for The Serpent and is a rapist.
Victim #2 (Carrie Mendelay) is worth 50,000 points for The Red Bishop and is an arsonist.

VFPD Search Bar Unlock

This involves determining which witnesses are telling the truth about seeing Daniel Jernigan’s murder

The Detective Notes sheet, detailing Daniel Jernigan’s murder, has accounts of several homeless people who all claim to have pertinent details. Only three are being truthful. You are given information that indicates one of the witnesses is known and has been truthful in the past. Use this as the baseline to determine which of the other two are being truthful.

The statements they make about each other are what you use to determine their honesty. Based on what they say about each other you can figure out which 3 are telling the truth. Hint: Freida is obviously lying since her statements about Ezra and Andrew cannot both be true since Ezra and Andrew make opposite statements. Once you have all three names, use them as the unlock password.

bobdaveezra

License Plate of Victim

When you unlock the VFPD Search Bar, you are given access to a Valley Falls Motor Vehicle Registration report.

Examine the statements of the three witnesses who were telling the truth. Two of these give you specific bits of information to help you determine which vehicle’s registration to examine.

Once you’ve found the vehicle that matches the witness statements, use the license plate of the victim to gain access.Determine which killer is responsible for the murder you uncover as a result and record the correct amount of points on the Scorecard.

scrmom

Victim #3 Puzzle

Note: puzzle uncovered by entering the correct license plate number of victim.Examine Sal’s Exotic Fish and Pets Card and notice how the groups of numbers correspond to the groups of letters in the puzzle.

Start at number 1 and work your way up, matching up those numbers that are highlighted in red and pull the corresponding letters from the card found at the scene of victim #3.

When finished, you should have something that can be read and will provide access to victim #4. Make sure to calculate the correct number of points for victim #3 and add to the scorecard for whichever killer earned them.

fishownerisvictimfour
Solution to unlock victim #4: sal (name of fish owner taken from business card) Victim #3 is worth 100,000 points for The Serpent because the victim was guilty of being a drug dealer and thief. The Serpent also receives 50,000 points that are taken away from The Red Bishop because of the rules Anubis has established for the duel (see rule 2 on Duel Rules).

Victim #4 Puzzle

Note:puzzle accessed only after solving puzzle from Victim #3. There is a grid of numbers and letters at the bottom of this unlock and an Egyptian symbol in the upper left hand corner.

You should have another card that features that same Egyptian symbol. Focus on the word that is in all CAPS.

Spell the word on the grid, making sure to take note of the specific letter and number coordinates where the letters from the capitalized word appear. Use the coordinates to unlock the Thornmire County BAU file. Make sure to calculate the correct number of points for victim #4 and add to the scorecard for whichever killer earned them.

b3d1b2a4c3
Victim #4 is worth 50,000 points for The Red Bishop and the crime he was guilty of was animal endangerment.

Victim #5

Note: puzzle obtained after unlocking victim #4. At the bottom of the description of victim #5, you have a series of images and letters in 4 columns. Take note of what these images are

Look at the quote by William Shakespeare and find the column that features the two images mentioned. Look at the arrows. They are telling you to swap two of the letters in the correct column.

Listen to the Breaking News report to get additional help for the solution to this. The code you get will just be 4 letters,use what you obtain to unlock the flower card. Make sure to calculate the correct number of points for victim #5 and add to the scorecard for whichever killer earned them.

wtvf
Victim #5 is worth 50,000 for The Red Bishop, and the crime he was guilty of was domestic abuse.

Victim #6/Keypad

Note: obtained by unlocking flower card. Make sure to calculate the correct number of points for Victim #6 and add to the scorecard for whichever killer earned them.

You are given the popular vote totals here as well. Record them on the scorecard. Examine the last paragraph of the reveal. Anubis has provided another bit of necessary info based on the types of victims that have been killed in the duel.

Take a look at the list of crimes on Anubis’ Duel Rules sheet and determine which of the crimes he has listed were not represented amongst the six victims.Use the numbers for each crime not represented on the keypad card. (Note: There should be five digits to this code). You will be given the first names of both The Serpent and The Red Bishop. Take note of these names. You will need one of these later.

67810
Victim #6 is innocent and causes The Serpent to lose 75,000 points.

Will Street Memo

One of Hypnos’ lieutenants, Chief, provides some information that you must decipher.

You will need to find numeric values for the six blanks.

Focus on the words that are capitalized. (Example: In the first sentence, the two words are Count and Sentences. This tells you to count the total number of sentences which provides the first value of 7). Einstein’s quote about mathematics indicates that some simple math may be required here. Follow the directions in each sentence with abnormal capitalization and determine all six values. Read Chief’s interview to determine what to do with these numbers.

795867

Dead Drops

In his interview, Chief talks a lot about a series of dead drops that The Scourge uses to make exchanges of information amongst its members.

He mentions running into a member of The Scourge that talks about the classifieds (see the ad from the Will Street memo) and repeats something that the Scourge member keeps repeating. “The numbers connect. Name what you find.” Take the six numbers you obtained from the classified ad puzzle and connect them in the order them appear.

You should end up with a familiar shape. Use the name of the shape to unlock the file.

star

Igor’s Interview

When you unlock the Dead Drop file, you find a previously unknown dead drop in a specific part of Valley Falls. This dead drop is a group of mailboxes. One of the mailbox numbers is starred. This same star is shown on Igor’s interview.

The statement beside the star says “The twelve Scourge mantras each contain a necessary word.”

There are 12 statements listed below. You will need 12 words obtained from these mantras. Use the number pulled from the Dead Drop unlock to determine which word from each mantra to use. The 12 words will provide a simple set of instructions.Follow those instructions to get the first part of the address where The Scourge meeting is being held.

To find the scourge, count the Team Serpent stars for house number

Duel Poster/Hieroglyphics

Examine the words and letters in red. When read together, these provide a simple set of instructions to use that will tell you how to manipulate the alphabet.

Change A to N, B to O, etc - Convert the alphabet accordingly, and use the modified alphabet you create to decode the message at the bottom of the Duel Poster.

The information will provide you with a vital clue about how to read the sheet of hieroglyphics. Once you know how to read the hieroglyphics you can use them to decode the message on The Red Bishop’s poster. This will provide the second half of the address to where The Scourge meeting will be held.

(duel poster) the eye of horus is the beginning of alphabet
Red Bishop Poster hieroglyphics translation: maple street

Where is The Scourge Meeting Being Held?

Use the information you gained from Igor’s interview/The Serpent poster and the information you gained from the Duel Poster/Hieroglyphics decode to unlock the file.

8maplestreet

Scourge Vote

When you find the location of The Scourge meeting, you will discover that you just missed them. However, you will also discover they took a vote of their own to award points.

Use the directions provided to calculate the points each killer earned from The Scourge vote.

Record the point values for each killer from this vote on the Scorecard. Don’t forget to record the bonus points awarded to the winner of The Scourge vote on the Scorecard.

The Red Bishop receives 55 points from the Scourge votes. Serpent receives 40 points. The Red Bishop receives the 350 point bonus.

And the Winner is…

By now, you should have all values listed on the Scorecard. Calculate the total for each of the killers and determine the winner

The total for each killer should be a six-digit figure.

Enter the point value for the winner to unlock the code. Obtain the loser’s last name.

The winner (The Red Bishop) accumulates 511,591 points at the end of the contest.

Final Solution

You will need the loser’s first and last name to unlock this. The first name was given to you by unlocking the keypad card. The last name was given to you when you entered the winner’s total correctly

Video Tape

Note: We are aware that there is a misspelling in this puzzle for the second word. Apparently, even serial killers make mistakes! This should not affect the outcome of the information you obtain.

The first thing you are told to do in The Pretender’s text message (on the back of the Beginning Brief) is to watch a movie. You have a video tape (Play Me) that has been left for you. Scan the QR code to play the video. You should notice in each segment of the video that a particular color is featured in what you see.

You also have 4 different colored notes (blue, white, red, yellow) by The Pretender. Use the video to obtain the correct order of the notes (by color). There are letters underlined in each of the notes. Now that you have the correct order of the colors (gained from the video) you can read the letters in the order they appear. Example: The color orders from the video are yellow, red, blue, and white so the letters would be I (taken from yellow), W (taken from red), O (taken from blue), U (taken from white), L (taken from yellow because you continue to repeat), and D (taken from red) which gives you the words I WOULD. *See above disclaimer on this second word. Continue this process until you run out of underlined letters on each of the notes- Read the message that results. You will be able to eliminate a suspect

I would never pretend to be a jerk like Sawyer

Grid Puzzle/Masked Face

The Connected Home card says, “For rules to the grid game, ask Connected Home.”

Scan the QR code to have Connected Home give you rules for the grid puzzle. Connected Home will give you four rules that you will use to rule out squares on the grid based on the numbers in each square

The first rule says “One digit is even and one digit is odd.” Disregard any square on the grid that doesn’t fit this rule. Do the same for the other three rules,eliminating squares based on those that don’t fit the rules. You should end up with a single square that meets all 4 rules. Note: The first few prime numbers are 2, 3, 5, 7, 11.

43 (Bell)

Classified Ad

Look for the words between question marks

Read from top to bottom.

Use what you obtain to link one of the suspects to their questionnaire answers on the scantron results.

Puzzle Piece Skull Puzzle

You should have a document that depicts a skull that is made out of puzzle pieces.

Notice the pattern of dots on the skull’s forehead. The pattern matches up with one of the sets of scantron answers on the questionnaire.

Essentially, this puzzle requires you to figure out which suspect corresponds to which set of answers and rule out the one whose answers match up to the pattern on the skull. This will require you to read every interview on the back of each suspect card and use the classified ad

The suspects will tell you things like which Bradley Raymond novel is their favorite or which story they love the most. These bits of information correspond to the questions listed on the questionnaire. The classified ad also contains some information about one of the suspects. Scan through the classifieds until you find words that are between two question marks. You should end up with a sentence based on those words (reading top to bottom) that helps match up one suspect with their question answers.

Scantron F is the one that matches up to the pattern on the skull. Morgan is the guest who corresponds to F.

Word Search

In order to complete this word search, you have to first determine what words you are looking for.

Each clue at the bottom of the page should help you determine the correct word to search for (example: past tense of am is the word ‘was’ so ‘was’ is the word you will find.)Once you have determined all the words you are looking for, find them in the word search above.

The Pretender also tells you to “read all to find out a fact about me.”Take all of the words you have gained and read them together as a single sentence. This sentence should be used to interpret something essential about a time when The Pretender was at the lodge (meaning anyone who wasn’t there at that time couldn’t possibly be considered a suspect). Take special note that the word ‘hands’ from the word search results is plural. That means think of both hands, not just one when interpreting The Pretender’s message. Each suspect tells you when they arrived at the lodge. Read the back of each suspect card and pull out all needed information to develop a timeline of when each suspect arrived and eliminate the one whose time of arrival falls outside of when The Pretender says he or she was there

(part 1): was here when clock hands were bound in prayer at Roman V

(part 2): This means that the clock hands were both pointed at the 5 which means The Pretender was present at the lodge at 5:25. The one who arrived after that couldn’t be the killer

(part 3): The number gained from letters where words intersect is ONE.

Floppy Disk

This should be tied to the word search results because the word ‘search’ is underlined.

To unlock the QR code it says to use the three-digit time (this should be obtained from correctly interpreting the word search result). The additional instruction tells you to add a number at the end made from the letters where words intersect

There should be three places in the word search where the words you have found intersect at a single letter. Use those letters to spell a number and add that number at the end of the sequence. Password to unlock should be four numbers (the three denoting the time mentioned in the word search and the number made from intersecting letters). The unlock will be used with The Machinery of Infinity.

5251 (see word search puzzle for details on how this was obtained)

The Machinery of Infinity/Aerial Photograph

When you unlock the floppy disk, you will see a schedule for Bradley Raymond’s Inagural Campout

Notice that some letters are highlighted in red. Also, notice the strange times for each event

The times on the schedule match up with times on the clocks on The Machinery of Infinity. The aerial photograph of the lodge can be linked to these two things because it mentions the crime scene game (which is one of the events on the schedule) and the infinity symbol (The Machinery of Infnity). The arrow pattern on the aerial photograph shows the order that the clocks should be read in (the lodge corresponds to the square clock). Starting at the lodge, follow the path of arrows and determine which clock they correspond to. For each clock, find the time on the schedule that matches up and use the red letter that corresponds. Read all of the letters together at the end and eliminate a suspect based on what you’ve learned.

I am not Grant

Hand Card

This one is simply based on correctly solving 5 other puzzles in the box (The Machinery of Infinity/Aerial Photo, Grid Puzzle, Video Tape/Colored Notes, Word Search, and Puzzle Piece Skull Puzzle).

Each of these 5 puzzles should eliminate a suspect. Use the first name of eachsuspect that corresponds to each of the 5 puzzles and obtain the letter from the name that you are told to pull out.

The five letters should spell a name that relates to The Pretender’s true identity. Use this name to unlock the QR code on the card. What you obtain from this unlock will be used in conjunction with the “From the Desk of Bradley Raymond” document you have

pryor

From the Desk of Bradley Raymond

Bradley Raymond gives you quite a bit of information about The Pretender. He also tells you that he is preparing the panic room at the cabin in the event The Pretender shows up

The last paragraph contains the essential information you will use. He tells you that “the key to opening the room is there.”

You should have a limited edition Bradley Raymond chapbook called “The Fourth Key.” Bradley Raymond also mentions “any page, any line, or any word he has ever written.” Notice that the code is written with 3 numbers. These correspond to page, line, and word. The document provides half of the code. The other half should have been obtained from the Hand QR code unlock. Using both pieces of information, determine the full set of numbers that you will use along with “The Fourth Key” story. Find the numbers that correspond to each page, line, word coordinate and use those digits to access the panic room.

Panic Room Access

Use the information obtained “From the Desk of Bradley Raymond” and the Hand QR unlock. (directions for both are in the previous two pages of this document).

221350

Spy Camera Unlock

When you encounter Bradley Raymond in the panic room, he tells you about a spy camera that he hid and how to access what’s on it.

Preston Ingalls should have the information you need.

crawlspace

Final Solution

The spy camera should provide a specific word that you will need to unlock this.

At this point, you should also have one suspect left that you have been unable to eliminate

Use the two together, to solve the box.

prestonignored
